answers.answer: i had suspected gestational diabetes and took the tea and it was fine. as long as you aren't adding sugar or honey then it should be fine. i think its a great idea to ask your doctor, just in case. i did and he said it was fine but each doctor is different.

question: Does anyone know if its ok to drink raspberry leaf tea if you have gestational diabetes? I will be asking my doctor on wednesday, but was just wondering if any of you guys knew?
title: raspberry leaf tea
